item.description:
A Sensual Tantric Pairing

The Growing Green Wellness Center offers a perfect recipe for a romantic evening for you and your partner! Organic snacks, wine & luxurious chocolates offer and Tantric evening of sensory awareness and intimacy.

Do you want to create a relationship that satisfies through and through? Do you want to rekindle passion and romance? Do you want to connect with your partner on every possible level â€” body, mind, heart & soul?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, you'll find what you're looking for at our Tantric Pairing class!

Cost: $64 per couple.
Registration required with pam@ashimore.com
item.name: Sensual Tantric Pairing
